thread.title: Sarasota celebrates Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. Day despite the weather
thread.title_full: Sarasota celebrates Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. Day despite the weather

author: - Unlimited Digital Access
title: Sarasota celebrates Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. Day despite the weather
text: NEWSDr. Martin Luther King Jr. Day marked by MLK Music Fest in SarasotaAttendees of the MLK Music Fest celebrated and danced at Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. Memorial Park following the Unity Walk in Sarasota on Monday, January 15. Guests braved the rainy conditions to enjoy live music performances and soulful cuisine for purchase by local vendors.Matt HoustonRingling College Sophmore Nevtar Azkadiny works on a painting during the MLK Music Fest at Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. Memorial Park which followed the Unity Walk in Sarasota on Monday, January 15. Guests braved the rainy conditions to enjoy live music performances and soulful cuisine for purchase by local vendors.Matt HoustonAttendees of the MLK Music Fest celebrated at Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. Memorial Park following the Unity Walk in Sarasota on Monday, January 15.
